prTitle: feat: implement EraFilter and SearchBar components (issue #84)
prBody:
## Summary

- **`src/hooks/useCarCatalog.ts`** — New hook that fetches `ferrari.json` and `lamborghini.json` in parallel, exposes `filteredFerraris` / `filteredLambos` arrays that react to era (decade) and debounced-search (300 ms) state, and derives `availableDecades` from the loaded catalog
- **`src/components/EraFilter.tsx`** — Decade-selector button row; active era highlighted with `ferrari-red`; clicking the active decade toggles it off; all buttons carry `aria-pressed`
- **`src/components/SearchBar.tsx`** — Controlled search input with a clear (×) button and a `ferrari-red` focus ring; debouncing lives in the hook, not the component
- **`src/components/CatalogFilters.tsx`** — Wrapper that composes `EraFilter` + `SearchBar` with a

shortcut when any filter is active
- Fixed pre-existing test mismatches in `DrinkCard.test.tsx` and `DrinkCatalog.test.tsx` that were introduced when the components were updated (data-selected attribute, button text order, aria-label patterns) — all flagged in the previous code review
- 50 new tests across four new test files; all 103 tests pass

Closes #84
